name: Pixelwork Interactive
tag_list: web, print, graphics, website-design, website-development, facebook-application, facebook-page-design, illustration, flash-design, flash-animation, corporate-brochure, logo-identity-sign
overview:
Pixelwork Interactive is a full service digital communication and branding agency. Our primary objective is to ensure client’s brand engagement with their customers. We consistently deliver outstanding results for our clients – and our philosophy ‘digital brand engagement’ permeates everything we do. Our formula is simple; We combine consultative strategy, exceptionally creative ideas and innovative technology solutions to deliver measurable results for our clients.

Pixelwork Interactive offers end to end Interactive Design, Development and Branding solutions. Relying on us allows you to concentrate more on your core business activities. With us you enjoy the same service as an in-house marketing team would provide. We provide our clients with exceptional creative and production quality and derive maximum returns on their investments.

Design Service: Web, Application, User Interface, marketing collateral, Print graphics, Illustrations, Corporate branding, Identity design etc.

Web marketing Service: SMM (Social Media Marketing), Web marketing, Email Marketing.

Social Media: Application Development. Content & Page Promotion.

Reach us : E-mail: contactpixelwork@gmail.com / contact@pixelworkinteractive.com
